experience.description: Men Isroilov Ibroximjon, Front-end va Software dasturchiman va hozirda PDP Universityda o'qiman va shu sohada o'z bilimlarimni oshirib bormoqdaman. Sizga kerak bo'lgan har qandan biror dasturiy ta'minot yoki web sayt bo'lsa men bilan bog'lanishingiz mumkin.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description: Front-End Development: Vue.js (Options API & Composition API), React.js (Hooks, Router, State Management), HTML5, CSS3, SCSS, JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript (basic). UI/UX & Design: Custom UI development without UI kits, responsive and mobile-first design, dark/light theme with CSS variables, clean component structure. Desktop App Development: Electron.js apps for Windows, macOS, and Linux; IPC, auto-updater, and security. Web & API Integration: RESTful APIs, Axios, Fetch, form handling and validation. State Management: Vuex, Pinia, Redux Toolkit, LocalStorage, real-time data integration. Dev Tools: Vite, Webpack, Git, GitHub, ESLint, Prettier. Debugging & Testing: Manual testing, browser and Electron debugging. Deployment & Systems: PM2, Nginx, basic Linux server management. Bots & Integrations: Telegram Bot API (node-telegram-bot-api), Telegram Web Apps, anonymous chat with token-based logic.

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description: Problem-solving mindset, strong communication, teamwork and collaboration, attention to detail, time management, critical thinking, adaptability, self-motivation, mentoring junior developers, continuous learning attitude.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
Hi, I’m Ibroximjon Isroilov — a passionate new front-end developer, and creative problem solver. I specialize in and React.js,bootstapt, tailwind and efficient code. Over the months, I’ve learn front-end, IoT-based monitoring systems, and Telegram bot integrations — all tailored for real-world users and cross-platform compatibility. I focus on speed, security, and user-friendly design, avoiding unnecessary libraries to keep things lightweight and reliable.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I'm deeply interested in problem solving, performance optimization, and building bot that solve real problems — not just look good. I believe the best developers are lifelong learners — and I’m always curious to dig deeper.

education.title: education
education.description: I hold a solid foundation in computer science and front-end development, supported by both academic and hands-on experience. I’ve continuously expanded my knowledge through real-world projects, advanced online courses, and by mentoring others in the field. While formal education gave me the basics, most of my skills were shaped by building actual applications — from custom CRMs and IoT dashboards to cross-platform Electron apps and Telegram bots. I believe in learning by doing, and my strongest education has come from solving real problems with clean code, smart design, and modern frameworks.
